DOC.brief_summary: The purpose 8-week intervention trial investigate effect dietary supplement ( contain citrus bioflavonoids vitamin E ) plus fish oil supplementation healthy hyperlipidemic subject
DOC.brief_title: Effect Citrus Bioflavonoids/Vitamin E Conjunction With Fish Oil Supplementation
DOC.criteria: men woman ≥ 18 ≤ 72 year old generally healthy BMI > 18 < 38 LDL cholesterol ≥ 130 mg/dl < 270 mg/dl triglyceride ≥ 150 mg/dl < 400 mg/dl ability understand willingness sign write informed consent use nutritional supplement medical food dyslipidemia within 30 day prior study use omega3 fatty acid dietary supplement within 30 day prior study use prescription HMGCoA reductase inhibitor , bile acid sequestrants , fibrates , cholesterol absorption block agent , niacin use prescription medication and/or nonprescription medication acute semiacute medical condition history cardiovascular disease , type diabetes , autoimmune disease , liver kidney disease , malignancy , serious mental illness . know infection HIB , TB , hepatitis B hepatitis C history allergy intolerance study product smoke , use nicotinecontaining product , use drug abuse 30 day prior study history regular intake > 14 alcoholic drink per week female > 21 drink per week male
